Author: throwaway37364783929
Text: In the same spot, a big lul in my recovery. But recovery isn’t linear. Everyone has up and downs in it. Don’t feed into the shame and guilt of “ruining” recovery bc it’s just gonna spark a full relapse.

Author: basic_throwawayy
Text: That sounds really hard and confusing :( I’m sorry. But I don’t think you should despair!! I’m sure it’s just a bump in the road, incredibly normal during recovery of any sort! Do your self care practices, snuggle up, try again tomorrow.
